page.title: 08TODAY'S RUBBISH
page.content: In Woodbury household rubbish is collected on Fridays . Large pieces of rubbish go into skips left in Woodbury.The following things were found in a skip : a broken bicycle , broken chair , carpet , fridge , numerous plastic bottles & tins , polystyrene , light bulbs , grass cuttings and one mattress. A school group visited Woodbury Car Breakers,a 2 acre scrap yard.Some of the cars looked in perfect condition , but were rusted out underneath. Other cars had been in accidents .Approx 100 cars are being broken up . The newest car was a "T" registration Ford (1978) Two men run the business ,the weekend is the busiest time.
